description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

platforms.name: FibaroHC2
platforms.host: PUT IP ADDRESS OF YOUR HC2 HERE
platforms.username: PUT USERNAME OF YOUR HC2 HERE
platforms.password: PUT PASSWORD OF YOUR HC2 HERE
platforms.pollerperiod: PUT 0 FOR DISABLING POLLING, 1 - 100 INTERVAL IN SECONDS. 2 SECONDS IS THE DEFAULT
platforms.securitysystem: PUT enabled OR disabled IN ORDER TO MANAGE THE AVAILABILITY OF THE SECURITY SYSTEM
platforms.switchglobalvariables: PUT A COMMA SEPARATED LIST OF HOME CENTER GLOBAL VARIABLES ACTING LIKE A BISTABLE SWITCH
platforms.thermostattimeout: PUT THE NUMBER OF SECONDS FOR THE THERMOSTAT TIMEOUT, DEFAULT: 7200 (2 HOURS). PUT 0 FOR INFINITE
platforms.enablecoolingstatemanagemnt: PUT on TO AUTOMATICALLY MANAGE HEATING STATE FOR THERMOSTAT, off TO DISABLE IT. DEFAULT off
platforms.excludedevices: PUT A COMMA SEPARATED LIST OF NAMES OF DEVICES TO BE EXCLUDED FROM AUTOMATED SUBMITTING TO HOMEBRIDGE
platforms.includedevices: PUT A COMMA SEPARATED LIST OF NAMES OF DEVICES THAT ARE INVISIBLE OR PREFIXED WITH '_' WHICH SHOULD ANYWAY BE INCLUDED IN AUTOMATED SUBMITTING TO HOMEBRIDGE
platforms.testmode: IF true, NO DEVICES WILL BE SUBMITTED TO HOMEBRIDGE, BUT ONLY LOGGED. USEFUL TO BUILD INCLUDE/EXCLUDE LIST. DEFAULT false
